item.title: Mobile Recharges and Bill Payments
item.description:
I worked on building a one-stop destination for bill payments and recharges for India that catered to more than 100 million customers monthly.

Mobile Recharges

I launched a redesigned experience for the Mobile Recharges category, which facilitates more than 10 million payments daily. This improved user convenience and revenue by

  • providing relevant recommendations and up-selling
  • making plan benefits easier to understand
  • speeding up page loads

Bill Payments

I built products to
